feed.title: Linux Compatible
feed.subtitle: Daily Linux news, information, hardware/software compatibility lists and tips and tricks.

entry.title: Tails 5.6 released
entry.summary: A new version of Tails has been released. Tails is a portable operating system that protects against surveillance and censorship.Tails 5.6 is out Changes and updates Update Tor Browser to 11.5.5. Update the Linux kernel to 5.10.149. This should improve the support for newer hardware: graphics, Wi-Fi, and so on. Fix ...

entry.title: How to Install KVM on Linux Mint 21?
entry.summary: Linux Hint published a tutorial about installing KVM on Linux Mint 21.How to Install KVM on Linux Mint 21? KVM is a virtualization solution that helps create Virtual Machines just like VMware or VirtualBox. This article explains KVM installation on Linux Mint. How to Install KVM on Linux Mint 21?

entry.title: Fedora Linux 37 RC 1.4 released
entry.summary: A new release candidate for Fedora Linux 37 is now available for download from the kojipkgs.fedoraproject.org website. This is an unsupported, unofficial image that may become the final release image at one point. The final release of Fedora 37 is now scheduled for November 1, 2022.Fedora Linux 37 RC 1.4 Released* ...

entry.title: GE-Proton7-38 released
entry.summary: Thomas Crider has released a new version of GE-Proton with fixes for Uncharted: Legacy of Thieves, Persona 5 Royal, Overwatch 2, and updated components.
